description: Phased removal plan for legacy per-stage GUI components, ordered by dependency relationships

phases.name: phase-1-standalone-v1-chairman
phases.description: Remove legacy Chairman V1 components that have direct V2 replacements and no cross-dependencies
prerequisites: Verify no active routes reference these components
Confirm Chairman V2 equivalents are fully functional

phases.name: phase-2-v1-chairman-interactive
phases.description: Remove Chairman V1 interactive components (override panels) after confirming DecisionStack handles all override scenarios
prerequisites: Chairman V2 DecisionStack covers all override use cases
No direct imports from other components

phases.name: phase-3-v1-stage-components
phases.description: Remove V1 stage components that have V2 equivalents. Must verify V2 StageRouter handles all routing correctly first.
prerequisites: V2 StageRouter verified for all stage numbers
No page components directly importing V1 stage components
Route configuration updated to use V2 components
